title: Ep 399 | Jase Meets a Goat Fighter & Zach’s Unexpected Houseguests
description:
Jase shares the story of a man he met who fights goats. Zach is startled when his son alerts him to strangers in their back yard. Jase attempts to improve upon the previous podcast discussion on Matthew 24. Phil stresses the importance of understanding the replacement of earthly kingdoms with the forever kingdom. Al explains how man's efforts cannot obtain innocence in the eyes of God. And Jase and Zach discuss the lesser-known trinities outside the holy trinity.

Read the first chapter of "Uncanceled" by Phil Robertson now: https://philrobertson.substack.com/p/uncanceled-chapter-one

The ONLY place to get "Your Daily Phil" by Phil Robertson in time to start off your new year: https://talkshop.live/watch/QID3D1y77yHJ 
-
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
